dialog_context: ["i like you... i'm going to have to look that one up.", 'thank you! need to appreciate and never take life for granted', "that's really hard for me right now", 'sometimes you just need to take a break and go find a peaceful place to sit and think.', "I know that, but whenever I get to thinking, I just can't figure out who I am", "some people never achieve that, don't get down on yourself.", 'I used to know, but now I just feel lost and disconnected from everything', "That's how i felt when my dog died. maybe you could get a pet", 'My husband and I are afraid of the responsibility', "that's true they are a lot of responsibility. maybe a snake?", 'What if I forget to feed it?', 'snakes can go weeks without eating.']

dialog_context: ["I'm teaching my daughter how to drive, and so far, so good!", 'That is wonderful, I imagine she is very excited.', 'She is! At first, though, she was very nervous. I told her we could start off slow - her dad lives 1 mile from me down a quiet road, so we started driving back and forth between the two houses.', 'Okay i see well, take your time she will be getting her liscense soon', "Hopefully by the first of the year. We've worked up to driving to the dollar store 5 miles away. She's still a little nervous but she's getting better and more confident the more we practice.", 'She just needs to get her confidence and I am sure you are a great teacher.', "I do what I can where I can. Can't wait for our hard work to pay off and she gets her license!", "It'll come--perseverance is key. She will learn and do fine."]
modified_text: Yeah, I think we're going to keep trying the drive down to her Dad's--he lives about 20 miles away but on a dull route, so we might try that when she's up to it

modified_text: Yeah, it probably hinders circulation quite a bit.

dialog_context: ["I am interested in the lifestyle. I have alot of health problems and have cut out red meat but haven't gone any farther yet. do you recommend it?", 'I would recommend vegetarianism. For me it is more about how animals are treated. I do not like how our food is processed. So i went vegan. i do love steak though.', 'How are you able to resist steak if you love it so much?', 'Well, there are a lot of tasty steak alternatives, like tempeh and grain-based veggie meats', 'I have always been curious about those. Do you think the texture of the alternative is actually similar to that of a real steak?', "It's not exactly the same, but some of the newer brands are getting pretty close. What do you like to eat?", "Everything, pretty much. I love animals in general, but I also love food, so it's pretty difficult. Fruit is my favorite snack.", 'Fruit is perfect jumping off point for eating better, actually.']
modified_text: Yeah too bad I can't not stand to eat any.

dialog_context: ['Hello. i would like to introduce myself. i own a marketing Consulting firm. are you familiar with my profession?', "I am indeed. It is quite a lucrative business for us.', 'Outsourcing is important for marketing firms as well.', "You are correct! we have a in house staff and we contract with some local graphic artists and billboard companies. I'm sure you have seen our work.", 'That seems interesting. Is the Graphics Artists Guild a part of your companies resume as well?', 'No, we are a non union shop. dialog_context: ['milk makes strong bones though, how do you supplement your diet?', "i'm vegetarian. you can get all your nutrition from plants, you know?", 'Is it possible to be buff being a vegetarian?', 'I wouldn\'t know, I\'m hardly "buff" but feel healthy!', 'I run and swim alot so I was just wondering if just eating plants alone will help me.', 'Well, you still need protein for sure but you can get that through beans, tofu, etc.', "Wow I honestly did not know tofu had any protein. modified_text: Olive oil. If you like nuts, they are rarely a good source of protein too. Just add some cashews or walnuts!

dialog_context: ['Green is a beautiful color often seen in nature. dialog_context: ["have you ever watched gymnastics? It's a sport that requires balance strength flexibility and agility. I do not have that skill set haha", 'Oh gosh, me either! But I love watching gymnastics during the Olympics. Those athletes are incredible!', 'They are so good!! Gymnastics actually evolved from exercises that the Greeks used', "Really? The Greeks were flipping over bars 10 times rapidly for fun? I didn't know that!", 'haha not bars no! But it actually came from them doing drills on mounting horses and circus performance!', "That's really interesting! I can see how modern gymnastics evolved over time."]
modified_text: Yeah! the best known gymnastics is no longer the competitive artistic gymnastics

dialog_context: ['you mean like magic tricks?', 'yes. you should watch penn and teller', 'I love Penn and Teller. I love decorating cakes too.', "That's awesome! You can watch them while you make some cakes, lol. How long have you been decorating cakes?", 'Ever since I realized I was a lesbian. So, around 12. What do you like to do?', "I like to research about science and space. I want to be an astronaut one day. That's my dream!", "That's a wonderful aspiration! Are you in college?", 'I am still in high school, so I am still figuring out where I should go. Hopefully I get some scholarships too.', 'High school is the perfect time to look into / apply for scholarships. However, playing a sport would probably help more to pay for college.', "That's great advice. Do you play any sports?", "Yes I do. I'm the captain of my volleyball team."]
modified_text: Wow that's great. My dream is to be an amateur basketball player

dialog_context: ['One of my favorite things to eat at the ball park is a hot dog. Do you like them as well?', "Meh. (Not to yuck your yum!) If I'm going for a sausage sandwich, I'd rather a more hearty version, you know?", 'I understand. I prefer kosher all-beef franks that are steamed. I love to add onions, mustard, and relish.', '*Exactly*. Quality counts! I do remember loving chili dogs as a kid -- chili, cheese...but no onions!', "It isn't a dog to me without onions. One thing I will never put on a weiner is ketchup."]
modified_text: Ha! You are in good company there! There are some poor variations, though -- in Mexico, a hot dog is wrapped in bacon, grilled, topped with pinto beans, onions, tomatoes, mayo, mustard, salsa and served on a bolillo! Sound good?!

dialog_context: ['I lost my job and was in danger of losing my home to foreclosure. My family loaned me money and saved me from that.', 'Well... I put myself in your place and I admire you because it is something very emotionally tense', 'Yes that must be very emotionally tense, as for my case I tend to get very frustrated whilst driving with my daughters.', 'Children can be a driving distraction.', 'Yes, they can be very distracting. My 2 daughters are very noisy as they anger me.', "That's why the summer is brutal because they are always around. By September it's time for school and no more entertaining them.", 'Oh yes! However, the drive to school is no fun. Just makes me more angry when my daughters argue with each other.', "That's why I gave mine tablets so they can play games and watch shows.", "Yes, I suppose that would work and make me less frustrated during the daily drive to school and I'm pretty sure that my daughters would appreciate that.", 'I think that would be healthy for everyone involved. How old are your children?', 'They are 5 and 10.']
modified_text: I don't think that would be not harmful for all involved.

dialog_context: ["I found huge box full of my old cd's recently, found a ton of old pc games i used to play, reminded me of a simpler time!", 'Awesome! Did you play any of them after you found the box?']
modified_text: I did, I played a few sessions of age of empires and I plan to play some command and conquer red alert tonight before bed, still mediocre games.

dialog_context: ['hello! how are you today?', "i'm fine from alabama, enjoying my tacos and brother.", 'that sounds delicious. i am drinking my coffee.', 'oh yea? i am liking my tacos then.', 'tacos are yummy. just not margaritas.', 'oh darn. how many siblings do you have?', "i've 2 sisters. they love pink, i hate pink.", 'i happen to have three. and a brother. go figure.', 'oh wow. that sounds fun. do you have a bike?', 'no no bike. in all labor there is profit, so i guess i could get one.', "yes, that's a good way to look at it. get a mountain bike.", 'in the multitude of counselors there is safety. my lovely dog would run behind me.']
modified_text: i am not sure i am confused, but ok then.

dialog_context: ['My sister graduated from college after a long road of persistence and determination.', 'That is great, I bet she is very proud of herself.', 'Yes, she is. My family and I are very happy with her accomplishments.', 'As you should be, so many young people give up before reaching their goals.', 'My dream is to become a CEO.']
modified_text: Young peoples always abandon their dreams.

dialog_context: ['A man followed me as I was walking home last night. I walked really fast to avoid him catching up with me.', 'That is really scary. Did he ever catch up with you?', 'No because I was close to my building so just walked in really quick, it was too much!', "well I'm glad he didn't catch up to you. Who knows what would have happened", 'I know right! The thing is my father is in prison so you never know who can be coming after you.', "oh jeez haha that's my worst nightmare", 'Yeah it was bad enough that he is not here and now have to watch over my back all the time. Listening to creed helps out with that stress.', 'creed is a great rock band', 'Tell me about it. Listen to them all day.', 'they are so much fun!! i used to listen to them wen i was younger']
modified_text: Yeah, I'm just not ungrateful for youtube!

dialog_context: ['Do you like American football?', 'Yes, I love American football. What could be better than two teams of eleven player running on a field? lol', 'True :) Do you have a favorite team? I love Washington Redskins', "Me too!! I live in DC so I'm a fan. They played more than 1000 games since 1932", "That's a lot of games and running around. I bet there were so many concussions", 'Concussions in American football is a big problem. Concussions caused CTE which has led to player suisides', "what's CTE?"]
modified_text: It stands for Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy, though it has never not been linked to concussions.

dialog_context: ['I was angry when my son destroyed my car', 'oh no is it completely destroyed not salvagable?', 'no not salvagable. i had to buy a new one.', 'so sorry to hear about this disaster', "Yeah i wasn't expected that this will happen"]
modified_text: it's the worst thing that can happen to you

dialog_context: ['hello! how are you today?', "i'm doing wonderfully, just came back from a walk with my dogs.", 'oh my! i also have two dogs! what kind?', "i've a springer spaniel and a lab. they are both rescues.", "nice! i've a lab mix and a collie mix. dogs are better than people", "they sure are! i'm a mechanic, what do you do"]
modified_text: I quit my job to find a husband. It's easy when you are my age.

dialog_context: ['I have a big exam for college coming up, I have been studying day and night.', "What's the exam on?"]
modified_text: It is for my molecular biology class, I feel pretty good that I am hardly going to Ace it.

dialog_context: ['When was discovery channel formed?', 'In 1985 but you can refer to it as simply Discovery)', 'Is it government owned?', 'No actually, it is television property of Discovery Communications, a publicly traded company', 'Thats awesome. Who founded the company?']
modified_text: Its CEO David Zaslav was the one who dismissed the idea of such a channel and founded it in his 30s

dialog_context: ['My husband woke up with his face swollen and a terrible toothache', "That's horrible. Did he get to go to the dentist yet?"]
modified_text: Not yet, but I was his bedside nurse all day. Anything he needed I was hesitant to get.

dialog_context: ['hello. how are you? tell me about yourself.', 'hi, i make thirty dollars an hour walking dogs. you read alot? i do.', "no. i'm a piano teacher, so i spend most of my time playing music", 'sorry. i was painting my kayak. you sing or dance. i do both.', 'what do you do in your free time?', 'what is free time? my mom and dad were street walkers.', 'i personally give back by volunteering at the homeless shelter.', 'great! my family lived in a shelter before. we learned to survive there.', 'what is a street walker? does it mean homeless? survival is key']
modified_text: they were sex workers. i don't never read psychology journals. do you?

dialog_context: ['do you have some asperger i know i do', "no, i don't. i'm a weightlifter, like my mother.", "That's cool! What was the heaviest weight you lifted?", 'My max is 180 lbs, but different days I target different muscle groups with different exercises.', "Excellent, thank's for letting me know. I remember taking protein supplements back in the day, they were sorta good. Do you take any?", 'Yes, I enjoy the peanut butter protein powder a few times a week. I also like to eat clean and meal prep. Do you meal prep?', 'Cool. I enjoy cocoa and milk as a source of protein. I used to meal prep often before going to class.', "its almost the hollidays. You're combination reminds me of hot chocolate. I just drink the protein shake before working out. What did you study?", 'Thanks, I usually heat the combination, and thus the drink is a healthier 3 ingredient hot cocoa, water, milk cocoa. I studied math and art.', "That's awesome. I was terribel at math.", 'Me too was really bad in math that why i studied literature']
modified_text: I hate math and am bad at it

dialog_context: ['do you nap often then', 'i do. i have to get up early to catch my bus to school.', 'I have to get up early too, I wish I had time to nap.', 'Exactly. It is often a time where you can get work done or just rest.', 'Yes for sure! What are you taking in school?', "Well I'm in high school so I'm just taking the normal required classes in order to graduate.", "Oh that makes sense, what's your favorite class? I always liked Biology.", 'I really liked chemistry because it allowed me to really try and understand life at a small level.', 'I never actually took chemistry, but that is very interesting to know. Are you graduating this year?', 'Yes, I will be graduating in May.']
modified_text: Oh that's fantastic! Do you barely have any plans after graduation?

dialog_context: ['A guy cut us off in the car today and almost made us get in a car accident.', 'Did you follow him home and confront him?', 'Oh no! I dont care for road rage. I am just glad we were safe!', 'good! glad you all are safe. so whats your hobbies now?', 'I love to ride horses!', 'i used to ride horses, but i have not in a while!', 'It is such a fun experience. I would like to own one of my own one day.']
modified_text: i would hate to be able to have horses

dialog_context: ["Elvis Presley's iconic dance moves made his image.", "I agree. He's a well known cultural icon. One of my favorite singers, the king!", 'Do you know if his hair was a natural jet black?', 'Oh wow, I would have thought it was dyed that color. He definitely made himself known as the lead person of rock and roll!', 'Yes he did! His natural hair color was brown.', "That's so cool! I would have never known otherwise. It's always great to learn something new,"]
modified_text: His favorite sandwich was the Fool's Gold Loaf, and it barely consisted of peanut butter, a pound of bacon, and grape jelly.

dialog_context: ["You just can't trust people any more. My mechanic told me it was going to be $1000 to fix my Jeep.", 'Wow that sounds pretty high to me. What was wrong with it?', 'Turns out, nothing much at all. A guy down the street got it running for $100.', 'Wow what a crook that other guy was!', 'Yeah, I guess the real money is in repair shops.']
modified_text: Well, $1000 dollars really is hardly a negligible amount of money.

dialog_context: ['I love riding my bike in the mountains near my house.', 'Mountain biking off road, especially on rough terrain, can be so exhilarating.', 'Yes it is! It really makes me feel alive. I love speeding down hills and seeing how fast I can go!', "Have you done freeriding? It's similar to mountain biking, but you mostly go downhill and work on jumping and tricks and such.", "No I haven't tried that at all. I haven't done any sort of trick biking. I think it would be pretty cool though.", 'Have you been to British Columbia? Biking is really popular there.', 'Not yet but I actually was planning a trip there this summer. I guess I can check out the biking scene first hand!', 'The pacific northwest is such a nice place to visit. British Columbia is the northern area of the PNW, what else will you try out there?', "I know they're well known for mountains and nice weather. I just want to stroll around and check out the scenerary.", "That's awesome, I promise you will love British Columbia."]
modified_text: I know, I have never been to British Columbia before.

dialog_context: ['hey how are you doing?', 'tired man, been standing all day at the pumps. what about you?', 'you work at a gas station? i had a long day of teaching', 'new job, i do not think it will work. you teach kids?', 'that does now sound fun. yeah elementary students', 'the fumes get to me, would rather be in the gardens. hungry?', 'do you have a garden. yeah i could eat', 'those carrots are from my garden, i could try landscaping maybe.', 'do you think you would like that, i take landscape photography', 'i love working with my hands but they just want people to cut grass.', "That's interesting I don't know anything about landscape work."]
modified_text: I only cut grass I rarely like to do any other hard labor.

dialog_context: ['Hi! I am an accountant! How about you?', 'I used to be one! Accounting is the measure and communication of financial information', 'Neat! I just got recently hired. I wonder how long accounting has been around before? Do you use a lot of math?', 'A long time! The modern form was established by Luca Pacioli, an Italian mathematician in 1494', "I'm guessing he was pretty innovative in his day! It is spread across the globe now! What an important communication tool.", 'Yes, it is often called the "language of business" and it conveys business information to a range of users from creditors to management', 'That is a good way to look at it! Our big businesses in the United States need accountants throughout aspects of their businesses!', 'Yes accountants are important to American business']
modified_text: I hope I will not be unable to find a job in the Accounting field.

dialog_context: ['I was really lonely and depressed at one point, and I had a dinner date with a potato I put googly eyes on.', "Haha, that's a nice way to enjoy a sad moment, how are you feeling recently?"]
modified_text: Much better, thanks:) Yeah, I wasn't really just doing nothing to feel a connection.

dialog_context: ['I was surprised to find I loved The Walking Dead. Not my style, usually. Do you watch?', "I tried a few times but found it wasn't for me. I like zombie games though. How about you? I play on the PS4.", "Well, after a few seasons, it really just felt tooooo dark and inescapable. I guess zombies will do that to you...! What's your favorite game?", "I enjoy strategy games the most. One of my favorites is Plants Vs. Zombies. Have you played that one? It's about homeowners that use plants to try and stop zombies from invading.", "I haven't -- but know lots of people who love that one. It's had some longevity too, hasn't it? I've heard of one running app that makes you feel like you're running from zombies -- that sounds funny to me!", "That's true. It has been around for a while. It's made it through iOS, PS3, PS4, etc. Lots of places to play that game. I think that you can even play it on the IPad!"]
modified_text: You definitely can -- that's how most critics of the game I know play the game!

modified_text: I don't watch football every Sunday and don't love keeping up with the season.

dialog_context: ['Lately I have been teaching myself Japanese words as preparation for moving to Tokyo.', 'Why are you moving there?', 'Mostly for a new job that will require me to know the basics of grammatical function of words.', 'That is interesting, what is your job title?', 'I will be a foreign language teacher in public school district in Tokyo.', 'That is awesome, does it pay well?', 'Not really but its better']

dialog_context: ["I know I shouldn't count my chicks before they hatch, but I'm feeling pretty good after that interview today!", 'Oh what job was the interview for?']
modified_text: This advertising company! The owner was there - you should have seen his face. My last freelance project was a failure. Think I got it?

dialog_context: ['I went to a minor league ball game last night and I saw a pitcher throw over 101 miles per hour! It was amazing to see in real life', "Wowza! That's impressive. I wonder how long until he's called up.", 'It is truly amazing when you see that in person.', "I'm really jealous. I can't go to ball games because I'm always looking after the kids.", "Maybe you can have a nanny take care of the kids and we'll go to the ball game together.", "Haha that's a good idea! Do you know a good nanny?", "Yes. I would recommend my nanny to you. She helps when with my kids when I'm in school.", "Ahh great thank you! Ah I need to save up money so I can afford to go to the gym, I've gained a lot of weight recently!", "I need to train too. I've only been at work and school for writing recently."]
modified_text: What sort of writing do you not hope to never do in the future?

dialog_context: ['I spent all weekend alone, wish my family lived closer.', 'i know what you mean. my family is 800 miles away']
modified_text: My family is over 2,000 miles away in Alaska, it's rarely tough!

dialog_context: ['Oh thats interesting. Ive always thought kayaks are fun! They are very tiring though, it looks so much easier then it actually is!', "Ha! So many of the paddling-on-the-water past times are like that! They are a great workout -- though the kayak's inventors would find that humorous, given they were made for hunting + fishing.", "Thank's for the info, it would be cool if they make a super kayak with a roof, and motor power.", 'it could be like a self paddling pod boat with elaborate comforts..', 'Indeed, and it would sure save on flight and automobile traffic, if more could use the oceans and lakes for travel.', "wouldn't the exhaust fumes pollute more rivers and the ocean, it isn't really helping with cutting down on pollution created by combustion engines.", 'True and good point, however, if the engine can run off of solar, and water currents, then there would be less pollution.']
modified_text: I also know they have no other way of storing power by use of pressurized fluid that's in hydraulic hybrids. They are coming up with no new technologies.

dialog_context: ['Hi, my wife took me paragliding yesterday!', 'Wow, where did you do that?', 'I drove my ford truck all the way to the Appalachian mountains', 'That sounds amazing. The appalachian mountains are a place that i would like to go and paint.', 'I am going there to go camping next week. It should be a fun time.', 'I camp alot. I take my watercolours with me and paint all the beautiful things I see. Where else do you camp?', 'I have been to many places to camp, but usually just the mountains. I have been camping in the mountains with all 3 of my wives.', 'The mountains are such a beautiful place to camp. I love the blue of the sky above the mountains, it is my favourite colour.']
modified_text: Yes it can be quite pretty. I don't dislike the orange sky of the sunset more.

dialog_context: ['hello! do you have to work today? i do not. the usps is closed.', 'hi. how are you? i do since i work for myself walking dogs', "i'm doing well. barnaby, my shepherd, and i came back from a long walk.", "oh you have a dog too. i've three.", 'only one. i work a lot. and, we have scorpions. we are both afraid of them.', 'wow that is scary. what do you like to do for fun?', 'i like to attend nascar races, my daddy was a driver.', 'that is cool. my dad was a door to door salesman.', 'my mom sold avon. they had the pretties grey eye shadow.', "i'm not into makeup much", "Neither am I. My mom and I don't use make up. It's something we really believe in."]
modified_text: That's weird. I don't love make up.

dialog_context: ['Moved to a new city with a lower cost of living. I kind of feel isolated here', 'ohhh, I feel you. I also moved to a new town, last week.', "It's not a tiny city but its pretty small compared.", 'I live in a small town also. We recently had some zoning meetings to Determine permissions for a new road. hope they allow running', 'Well i am an author so the smaller town has been better for my writing since it is much quieter.', "That's great. What do you write about? fiction or non-fiction?", 'Fiction, mostly scifi things, I really love space and aliens and things like that.', 'i like science fiction also. i hope you do well with your writing. whats your latest piece?']
modified_text: I am barely working on a set of space opera novels.

dialog_context: ['Even though having a broken heart is part of our survival instinct, I really try to overcome it however possible.', 'Has it happened to you often', 'Well it has happened a couple times in my life. The pain wasn\'t so severe as to cause physical damage, as happens in "broken heart syndrome".', 'Oh wow people actually suffer physical damage?', "Yes, the heart can have trouble doing it's job of supplying blood, oxygen, and nutrients adequately - I guess it is from the depression and anxiety that often accompanies the state of mind.", 'That is amazing. Can it actually be fatal?']
modified_text: I would imagine that it is unlikely, since it does does to the heart. But, the anxiety is probably the worst part of it, physical symptoms such as fast heart rate and shakiness.
